title: Rewards for stakers in USDT protection continuous pool on Opium.Finance
body:
We propose that the stakers of the continuous USDT protection staking pool, who provide liquidity into the 1inch Exchange Liquidity Mining program (OPIUM_LP_34b7 — USDC pair) will receive the liquidity mining rewards for the following periods proportional to their stake in the pool:

* 1st epoch of continuous USDT protection staking pool (4 APR) - 8’000 $OPIUM
* 2st epoch of continuous USDT protection staking pool (4 MAY) - 8’000 $OPIUM

Read the full proposal and discussion on the governance forum:
https://forum.opium.network/t/proposal-rewards-for-stakers-in-usdt-protection-continuous-pool-on-opium-finance/193
author: 0x55E170F82F50298188eecCe988e17046Dbef56A0
